entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
